20110114160231.000|20110114160234.000|TR0|journey to recovery.  Her husband says 
20110114160234.000|20110114160237.000|TR0|doctors may remove that breathing tube 
20110114160237.000|20110114160240.000|TR0|today.  Six days after she was shot in the 
20110114160240.000|20110114160242.000|TR0|head, Giffords continues to defy the odds. 
20110114160242.000|20110114160245.000|TR0|      She opened her eyes for the first 
20110114160245.000|20110114160248.000|TR0|time on Wednesday.  Doctors say her eye 
20110114160248.000|20110114160251.000|TR0|movement suggests she's aware of her 
20110114160251.000|20110114160253.000|TR0|surroundings, and she's able to move her 
20110114160253.000|20110114160256.000|TR0|arms and her legs.

20110114160334.000|20110114160337.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  Captain Mark Kelly was in 
20110114160337.000|20110114160340.000|TR0|Houston when he got the call from 
20110114160340.000|20110114160343.000|TR0|Giffords' chief of staff telling him to 
20110114160343.000|20110114160345.000|TR0|come quickly to Tucson.  He's a Navy 
20110114160345.000|20110114160348.000|TR0|pilot, he's an astronaut.  He was able to 
20110114160348.000|20110114160351.000|TR0|get on a plane, a private one, and get 
20110114160351.000|20110114160353.000|TR0|here within 45 minutes, he told me.
20110114160353.000|20110114160356.000|TR0|
20110114160356.000|20110114160359.000|TR0|He got here right as his wife was coming 
20110114160359.000|20110114160402.000|TR0|out of the operation and into the ICU, and

20110114160407.000|20110114160410.000|TR0|what had happened, learned the details of 
20110114160410.000|20110114160413.000|TR0|this gunshot injury to his wife's brain.  
20110114160413.000|20110114160415.000|TR0|Remarkable.
20110114160415.000|20110114160418.000|TR0|

20110114160434.000|20110114160437.000|TR0|second and he said, "Well, I think she 
20110114160437.000|20110114160440.000|TR0|knew he was there, but she was trying to 
20110114160440.000|20110114160443.000|TR0|piece together why he was there."

20110114160448.000|20110114160451.000|TR0|important to get an idea of exactly where

20110114160454.000|20110114160456.000|TR0|now.  She's starting to put pieces of this 
20110114160456.000|20110114160459.000|TR0|puzzle together, trying to understand

20110114160502.000|20110114160505.000|TR0|

20110114160832.000|20110114160835.000|TR0|gunshot wound is -- there's lots of 
20110114160835.000|20110114160838.000|TR0|different factors.  But one of them was 
20110114160838.000|20110114160841.000|TR0|the speed at which this all worked.

20110114161008.000|20110114161011.000|TR0|was, but she has found her dwelling place 
20110114161011.000|20110114161014.000|TR0|in God's mansion.  She went home.

20110114161049.000|20110114161052.000|TR0|
20110114161052.000|20110114161055.000|TR0|First lady Michelle Obama released an open 
20110114161055.000|20110114161057.000|TR0|letter to the parents of children 
20110114161057.000|20110114161100.000|TR0|struggling with this tragedy.  She writes, 
20110114161100.000|20110114161103.000|TR0|"The questions my daughters have asked are 
20110114161103.000|20110114161105.000|TR0|the same ones that many of your children 
20110114161105.000|20110114161108.000|TR0|will have, and they don't lend themselves 
20110114161108.000|20110114161111.000|TR0|to easy answers.  But they will provide an 
20110114161111.000|20110114161114.000|TR0|opportunity for us as parents to teach 
20110114161114.000|20110114161116.000|TR0|them valuable lessons about the character 
20110114161116.000|20110114161119.000|TR0|of our country, about the values we hold 
20110114161119.000|20110114161122.000|TR0|dear, and about finding hope at a time 
20110114161122.000|20110114161125.000|TR0|when it seems so far away."

20110114161141.000|20110114161144.000|TR0|sex with a teenaged girl, a 
20110114161144.000|20110114161146.000|TR0|then-17-year-old nicknamed Ruby.  They 
20110114161146.000|20110114161149.000|TR0|also claim he abused his power by covering

20110114161211.000|20110114161214.000|TR0|
20110114161214.000|20110114161217.000|TR0|HALA GORANI, CNN INTERNATIONAL ANCHOR:  So 
20110114161217.000|20110114161219.000|TR0|what are the chances he will face these

20110114163517.000|20110114163520.000|TR0|
20110114163520.000|20110114163523.000|TR0|JOHNSON:  The choices are really 
20110114163523.000|20110114163526.000|TR0|challenging.  It's worth remembering that 
20110114163526.000|20110114163528.000|TR0|this is the continued aftereffects of the 
20110114163528.000|20110114163531.000|TR0|recession. The recession put people out of 
20110114163531.000|20110114163534.000|TR0|work, people are spending less.  And so, 
20110114163534.000|20110114163537.000|TR0|there's less income tax revenue, less 
20110114163537.000|20110114163539.000|TR0|sales tax revenue.  State uses income and 
20110114163539.000|20110114163542.000|TR0|sales tax revenues to pay for education, 
20110114163542.000|20110114163545.000|TR0|health care, public safety, 
20110114163545.000|20110114163547.000|TR0|transportation, and they have to balance 
20110114163547.000|20110114163550.000|TR0|their budgets. So most states have now 
20110114163550.000|20110114163553.000|TR0|used up the reserves that they built up 
20110114163553.000|20110114163556.000|TR0|during the expansion earlier of the last 
20110114163556.000|20110114163558.000|TR0|decade and so they're faced with very 
20110114163558.000|20110114163601.000|TR0|tough choices.
20110114163601.000|20110114163604.000|TR0|
20110114163604.000|20110114163607.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  A lot of people blame these 
20110114163607.000|20110114163609.000|TR0|public pension plans for these big 
20110114163609.000|20110114163612.000|TR0|shortfalls.  In your mind, how much are 
20110114163612.000|20110114163615.000|TR0|they to blame?
20110114163615.000|20110114163618.000|TR0|
20110114163618.000|20110114163620.000|TR0|JOHNSON:  Pension plans actually have 
20110114163620.000|20110114163623.000|TR0|nothing to do with the current shortfalls. 
20110114163623.000|20110114163626.000|TR0| The current shortfalls are all about the 
20110114163626.000|20110114163629.000|TR0|revenue streams that are coming into 
20110114163629.000|20110114163631.000|TR0|states.  State revenues are running about 
20110114163631.000|20110114163634.000|TR0|12 percent below prerecession levels, and 
20110114163634.000|20110114163637.000|TR0|states and localities are having to pay 
20110114163637.000|20110114163639.000|TR0|for a higher level of services.
20110114163639.000|20110114163642.000|TR0|
20110114163642.000|20110114163645.000|TR0|Pension shortfalls are an issue, but 
20110114163645.000|20110114163648.000|TR0|that's a long-term issue. States have a 
20110114163648.000|20110114163650.000|TR0|couple of decades with which to address 
20110114163650.000|20110114163653.000|TR0|the underfunding of state pension plans.
20110114163653.000|20110114163656.000|TR0|
20110114163656.000|20110114163659.000|TR0|What's at stake right now is, again, the 
20110114163659.000|20110114163701.000|TR0|services -- education, health care.  You 
20110114163701.000|20110114163704.000|TR0|have states like New Jersey, New Jersey 
20110114163704.000|20110114163707.000|TR0|cut 50,000 people from a health insurance 
20110114163707.000|20110114163710.000|TR0|plan.  That means families that face a 
20110114163710.000|20110114163712.000|TR0|medical need may have no way it to pay for 
20110114163712.000|20110114163715.000|TR0|it.
20110114163715.000|20110114163718.000|TR0|
20110114163718.000|20110114163720.000|TR0|You have cuts in education.  Hawaii 
20110114163720.000|20110114163723.000|TR0|shortened it's school year last year by 17 
20110114163723.000|20110114163726.000|TR0|days and that's a lot of lost learning.

20110114163729.000|20110114163731.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  We sit back though and we hear, 
20110114163731.000|20110114163734.000|TR0|oh, the recession is technically over, the

20110114163751.000|20110114163753.000|TR0|revenues tick up just a little bit.  But 
20110114163753.000|20110114163756.000|TR0|here's the problem, even as tax revenues

20110114163759.000|20110114163801.000|TR0|for services has risen quite rapidly.  We 
20110114163801.000|20110114163804.000|TR0|have three-quarters of a million more 
20110114163804.000|20110114163807.000|TR0|children in public schools than we had 
20110114163807.000|20110114163810.000|TR0|three years ago.  There's more students in

20110114164549.000|20110114164552.000|TR0|Jared Loughner's alleged actions outside a 
20110114164552.000|20110114164555.000|TR0|Tucson Safeway last weekend may have been 
20110114164555.000|20110114164557.000|TR0|influenced by conscious dreaming, or as 
20110114164557.000|20110114164600.000|TR0|some call it, lucid dreaming.  Is this 
20110114164600.000|20110114164603.000|TR0|just product of an unbalanced mind?
20110114164603.000|20110114164605.000|TR0|
20110114164605.000|20110114164608.000|TR0|We asked CNN's Randi Kaye to look into it.
20110114164608.000|20110114164611.000|TR0|
20110114164611.000|20110114164614.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEOTAPE)
20110114164614.000|20110114164616.000|TR0|
20110114164616.000|20110114164619.000|TR0|RANDI KAYE, CNN CORRESPONDENT 
20110114164619.000|20110114164622.000|TR0|(voice-over):  In the months before the 
20110114164622.000|20110114164625.000|TR0|shooting, Jared Loughner appears 
20110114164625.000|20110114164627.000|TR0|especially disturbed.  His world was 
20110114164627.000|20110114164630.000|TR0|getting darker, his questions stranger.
20110114164630.000|20110114164633.000|TR0|
20110114164633.000|20110114164636.000|TR0|(on camera):  Chartroom postings published 
20110114164636.000|20110114164638.000|TR0|by "The Wall Street Journal" offer insight 
20110114164638.000|20110114164641.000|TR0|into Loughner's growing disappointment and 
20110114164641.000|20110114164644.000|TR0|resentment, a window into his state of 
20110114164644.000|20110114164646.000|TR0|mind.  "The Journal" says Loughner, using 
20110114164646.000|20110114164649.000|TR0|a pseudonym, posted more than 130 messages 
20110114164649.000|20110114164652.000|TR0|last spring over a two month period on an 
20110114164652.000|20110114164655.000|TR0|online gaming forum.  He seemed to be 
20110114164655.000|20110114164657.000|TR0|dealing with feelings of rejection and 
20110114164657.000|20110114164700.000|TR0|searching for a purpose.
20110114164700.000|20110114164703.000|TR0|
20110114164703.000|20110114164706.000|TR0|(voice-over):  CNN hasn't been able to 
20110114164706.000|20110114164708.000|TR0|confirm independently the postings are 
20110114164708.000|20110114164711.000|TR0|Loughner's, but they are filled with 
20110114164711.000|20110114164714.000|TR0|aggression, many of them too startling to 
20110114164714.000|20110114164717.000|TR0|comprehend.
20110114164717.000|20110114164719.000|TR0|
20110114164719.000|20110114164722.000|TR0|April 24th, last year, he asked, "Would 
20110114164722.000|20110114164725.000|TR0|you hit a handy cap child/adult?"  Later 
20110114164725.000|20110114164727.000|TR0|that same day, a hate filled rant titled, 
20110114164727.000|20110114164730.000|TR0|"Why rape" suggesting college women 
20110114164730.000|20110114164733.000|TR0|enjoyed rape.  "There are rape victims 
20110114164733.000|20110114164736.000|TR0|that are under the influence of a 
20110114164736.000|20110114164738.000|TR0|substance.  The drinking is leading them 
20110114164738.000|20110114164741.000|TR0|to it rape...being alone for a very long 
20110114164741.000|20110114164744.000|TR0|time will inevitably lead you to rape."
20110114164744.000|20110114164747.000|TR0|
20110114164747.000|20110114164749.000|TR0|May 9th, he asked, "Does anyone have 
20110114164749.000|20110114164752.000|TR0|aggression 24/7?"
20110114164752.000|20110114164755.000|TR0|
20110114164755.000|20110114164758.000|TR0|The next night, a new online thread.  "If 
20110114164758.000|20110114164800.000|TR0|you went to prison right now...what would 
20110114164800.000|20110114164803.000|TR0|you be thinking?"  He added, "Just 
20110114164803.000|20110114164806.000|TR0|curious?"
20110114164806.000|20110114164809.000|TR0|
20110114164809.000|20110114164811.000|TR0|May 20th, he wrote, "I bet you're 
20110114164811.000|20110114164814.000|TR0|hungry...because I know how to cut a body 
20110114164814.000|20110114164817.000|TR0|open and eat you for you more than a week."
20110114164817.000|20110114164819.000|TR0|
20110114164819.000|20110114164822.000|TR0|If Loughner was looking to escape his 
20110114164822.000|20110114164825.000|TR0|demons and reality, too, he may have done 
20110114164825.000|20110114164828.000|TR0|so through something called lucid 
20110114164828.000|20110114164830.000|TR0|dreaming, an alternative reality in which 
20110114164830.000|20110114164833.000|TR0|a person is aware he's in a dream and can 
20110114164833.000|20110114164836.000|TR0|manipulate that dream.
20110114164836.000|20110114164839.000|TR0|
20110114164839.000|20110114164841.000|TR0|Psychology professor Gary Schwartz has 
20110114164841.000|20110114164844.000|TR0|studied lucid dreams.
20110114164844.000|20110114164847.000|TR0|
20110114164847.000|20110114164850.000|TR0|(on camera):  Can lucid dreaming be 
20110114164850.000|20110114164852.000|TR0|dangerous?
20110114164852.000|20110114164855.000|TR0|
20110114164855.000|20110114164858.000|TR0|PROF. GARY SCHWARTZ, UNIVERSITY OF 
20110114164858.000|20110114164900.000|TR0|ARIZONA:  For someone who might be 
20110114164900.000|20110114164903.000|TR0|mentally ill, it could become very 
20110114164903.000|20110114164906.000|TR0|dangerous, especially if they were 
20110114164906.000|20110114164909.000|TR0|obsessed with it.
20110114164909.000|20110114164911.000|TR0|
20110114164911.000|20110114164914.000|TR0|KAYE (voice-over):  And friends say 
20110114164914.000|20110114164917.000|TR0|Loughner was obsessed with lucid dreaming. 
20110114164917.000|20110114164920.000|TR0| One friend, Zane Gutierrez , told "The 
20110114164920.000|20110114164922.000|TR0|New York Times," "Jared felt nothing 
20110114164922.000|20110114164925.000|TR0|existed but his subconscious...the dream 
20110114164925.000|20110114164928.000|TR0|word was what was real to Jared, not the 
20110114164928.000|20110114164931.000|TR0|day-to-day of our lives."
20110114164931.000|20110114164933.000|TR0|
20110114164933.000|20110114164936.000|TR0|Another friend, Bryce Tierney , told the 
20110114164936.000|20110114164939.000|TR0|online publication "Mother Jones" that 
20110114164939.000|20110114164941.000|TR0|Loughner viewed dreams as his alternative 
20110114164941.000|20110114164944.000|TR0|reality. Tierney said Loughner even kept a 
20110114164944.000|20110114164947.000|TR0|dream journal.  "That's the golden piece 
20110114164947.000|20110114164950.000|TR0|of evidence," Tierney said, "You want it 
20110114164950.000|20110114164952.000|TR0|know what goes on in Jared Loughner's 
20110114164952.000|20110114164955.000|TR0|mind, there's a dream journal that will 
20110114164955.000|20110114164958.000|TR0|tell you everything."
20110114164958.000|20110114165001.000|TR0|
20110114165001.000|20110114165003.000|TR0|Strange ramblings apparently posted on 
20110114165003.000|20110114165006.000|TR0|YouTube by Loughner just within the last 
20110114165006.000|20110114165009.000|TR0|month or so paint the picture of a young 
20110114165009.000|20110114165012.000|TR0|man apparently losing his grip on reality. 
20110114165012.000|20110114165014.000|TR0| On December 15th, Loughner wrote about 
20110114165014.000|20110114165017.000|TR0|lucid creaming.  "My favorite activity is 
20110114165017.000|20110114165020.000|TR0|conscience dreaming...some of you don't 
20110114165020.000|20110114165022.000|TR0|dream...sadly."
20110114165022.000|20110114165025.000|TR0|
20110114165025.000|20110114165028.000|TR0|He later wrote, "The population of 
20110114165028.000|20110114165031.000|TR0|dreamers in the United States is less than 
20110114165031.000|20110114165033.000|TR0|5 percent."  Also, "Jared Loughner is 
20110114165033.000|20110114165036.000|TR0|conscious dreaming at this moment.  Thus, 
20110114165036.000|20110114165039.000|TR0|Jared Loughner is asleep."
20110114165039.000|20110114165042.000|TR0|
20110114165042.000|20110114165044.000|TR0|(on camera):  Loughner's focus on dreaming 
20110114165044.000|20110114165047.000|TR0|has some experts wondering if he could no 
20110114165047.000|20110114165050.000|TR0|longer tell the difference between dreams 
20110114165050.000|20110114165053.000|TR0|and reality.  If so, is it possible he was 
20110114165053.000|20110114165055.000|TR0|dreaming when he allegedly shot 
20110114165055.000|20110114165058.000|TR0|Congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords and all 
20110114165058.000|20110114165101.000|TR0|those other people?
20110114165101.000|20110114165104.000|TR0|
20110114165104.000|20110114165106.000|TR0|SCHWARTZ:  It is conceivable from what we 
20110114165106.000|20110114165109.000|TR0|know about his history that he was -- he 
20110114165109.000|20110114165112.000|TR0|could have been confusing when he was in a 
20110114165112.000|20110114165114.000|TR0|dream and when he wasn't in a dream.  And 
20110114165114.000|20110114165117.000|TR0|so, we have to be open to that possibility.
20110114165117.000|20110114165120.000|TR0|

20110114165128.000|20110114165131.000|TR0|could control his dreams.  He said he told

20110114165134.000|20110114165136.000|TR0|create things and fly.  I'm everything I'm

20110114165258.000|20110114165301.000|TR0|COSTELLO: A year ago this week, a violent 
20110114165301.000|20110114165304.000|TR0|earthquake brought Haiti to its knees.  An 
20110114165304.000|20110114165307.000|TR0|estimated 230,000 people were killed and 
20110114165307.000|20110114165309.000|TR0|more than 300,000 injured.
20110114165309.000|20110114165312.000|TR0|
20110114165312.000|20110114165315.000|TR0|A woman who lost both hands now wants to 
20110114165315.000|20110114165317.000|TR0|help others in her homeland.  Dr. Sanjay 
20110114165317.000|20110114165320.000|TR0|Gupta brings us her story in today's 
20110114165320.000|20110114165323.000|TR0|"Human Factor."
20110114165323.000|20110114165326.000|TR0|
20110114165326.000|20110114165328.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEOTAPE)
20110114165328.000|20110114165331.000|TR0|
20110114165331.000|20110114165334.000|TR0|DR. SANJAY GUPTA, CNN CHIEF MEDICAL 
20110114165334.000|20110114165337.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT (voice-over): As the walls 
20110114165337.000|20110114165339.000|TR0|disintegrate and the ceiling crumbles, 
20110114165339.000|20110114165342.000|TR0|Darlene Bertilles (ph) first thought was, 
20110114165342.000|20110114165345.000|TR0|the world was ending.
20110114165345.000|20110114165348.000|TR0|
20110114165348.000|20110114165350.000|TR0|DARLENE BERTILLES, HAITI EARTHQUAKE 
20110114165350.000|20110114165353.000|TR0|SURVIVOR(through translator): I didn't 
20110114165353.000|20110114165356.000|TR0|realize that it was an earthquake.
20110114165356.000|20110114165359.000|TR0|

20110114165401.000|20110114165404.000|TR0|Bertilles was at work.
20110114165404.000|20110114165407.000|TR0|
20110114165407.000|20110114165409.000|TR0|BERTILLES:  The mirror broke and the 
20110114165409.000|20110114165412.000|TR0|glasses and bottles blocked the way.  You 
20110114165412.000|20110114165415.000|TR0|couldn't even run.  And then, the ceiling 
20110114165415.000|20110114165418.000|TR0|fell out.
20110114165418.000|20110114165420.000|TR0|
20110114165420.000|20110114165423.000|TR0|GUPTA:  Within seconds, Bertilles was 
20110114165423.000|20110114165426.000|TR0|entombed, pinned beneath a coworker in a 
20110114165426.000|20110114165429.000|TR0|mound of rumble for five days.
20110114165429.000|20110114165431.000|TR0|
20110114165431.000|20110114165434.000|TR0|BERTILLES:  After a while, I felt like I 
20110114165434.000|20110114165437.000|TR0|was in a dream.  After that, I didn't know 
20110114165437.000|20110114165440.000|TR0|anything.
20110114165440.000|20110114165442.000|TR0|

20110114165448.000|20110114165450.000|TR0|idea what happened to her or her country.

20110114165501.000|20110114165504.000|TR0|Up until now, I didn't know that I had 
20110114165504.000|20110114165507.000|TR0|lost my two hands.
